name: Investment Portfolio Tracker
description: Only tool you need to focus on managing a diversified investment portfolio, including tracking individual assets and their performance.Do you feel overwhelmed managing your investments and still feel lost where your investments are heading into ?This Notion template is all you need to manage all your investments like stock, bonds, crypto, mutual funds etc in one place with a simple and easy to use interface as shown below.Are you looking to automate PDF generation for repetitive documents like i
features: Google Doc Template: A template file with placeholders in {{...}} format (e.g.,{{InvoiceNumber}},{{ClientName}}).; Notion Database: Acts as a database with matching headers likeClientName,InvoiceDatefor seamless placeholder mapping.; Install the extension and setup the automation.; One-time setup and configuration; Quick 5-minute installation process; Copy Notion Database properties placeholders; Paste them into your Google Document template; One-time setup per document template; Set your preferred automation schedule; Automatically scans Notion database
